snippet: On Tuesday, “Cold War,” a 24-part CNN documentary series first shown on television in 1998, will be released on DVD.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley TV Watch column discusses the 24-part CNN documentary series Cold War, which first aired in 1998 and has now been released on DVD.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, “Cold War,” a 24-part CNN documentary series first shown on television in 1998, will be released on DVD.

headline.seo: CNN’s ‘Cold War’ Will be Released on DVD on Tuesday
headline.main: Still a Chill in Spy vs. Spy
headline.print_headline: Still a Chill in Spy vs. Spy
